charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) and 960(b)(2)(A); 18:3551 et seq.; DEFENDANT KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY IMPORTED INTO THE UNITED STATES HEROIN, SCHEDULE I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 46 months. Upon release from Imprisonment, defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 36 months. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(i); 18:3551 et seq.; DEFENDANT KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE HEROIN, SCHEDULE I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Open Counts are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (2)
